1370: Sollen was born in St. Ians straet in 1370.

Had a son with Gloria, Radulphus, at age 28.
1372: Had a son with Gloria, Woutersoet, at age 30.
1377: Had a daughter with Gloria, Ghoudekinen, at age 35.
1381: Had a daughter with Gloria, Goneir, at age 39.
1382: Lost son Hylonus when Hylonus was 0 years old.
